text: Musrikon turo, ej Pajomʙar, az cang kardan dar mohi harom mepursand. Bigu: Cang kardan dar on moh gunohi ʙuzurge ast. Ammo kofir sudanaton ʙa Alloh va ʙa Rasuli U va dinas va ʙozdostani mardum az rohi Haq va Mascidulharom va ʙerun rondani Pajomʙar va muhociron az on co dar nazdi Alloh gunohi ʙuzurgtar ast va fitna kardan az qatl ʙuzurggar ast. Onho hamesa ʙo sumo mecangand, to agar ʙitavonand, sumoro az dinaton ʙozgardonand. Az mijoni sumo kase onhoro, ito'at kard va az dini xud ʙozgast va kofir ʙimirad, amalhojas dar dunjo va oxirat noʙud suda, covidona dar cahannam ʙoqi ʙimonad
